name: SnowDice - Winter Belongs to You
description:
Not wanting Winter to end, the DiceMan has been doing all he can to keep the cold alive. The time for Spring has come and gone; the sun is getting angry, and won't wait any longer for Summer! Luckily, DiceMan can use Dice Combos to keep the sun at bay. Keep Winter going! Your un-melted life depends on it!

SnowDice - Winter Belongs to You was created by myself (Commander Jersey) in 50 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, with the theme "Roll of the Dice". I hope you enjoy playing the game!

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move

Spacebar/Up - Jump

C Key - Cycle Dice
